option.value: {"/Users/grino/AndroidStudioProjects/Units/Compose/KarateClup":"{\"/app/src/test/java/pro/grino/karateclup/ExampleUnitTest.kt\":\"This file contains a single unit test class with one test function. The file does not define any classes or functions, but rather contains a single unit test that verifies the correctness of the addition operation.\\n\\n`ExampleUnitTest`: A unit test class that contains a single test case to verify the correctness of the addition operation.\\n\\n`addition_isCorrect()`: A test function that checks if the addition of 2 and 2 results in 4, which is the expected outcome.\",\"/build.gradle.kts\":\"This file is a top-level build file that sets up common configuration options for all sub-projects or modules in the Android application. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather sets up the necessary plugins for the Android application and Kotlin Android development.\\n\\nThe file does the following:\\n\\n1. Applies the Android application plugin to all sub-projects/modules.\\n2. Applies the Jetbrains Kotlin Android plugin to all sub-projects/modules.\",\"/app/build.gradle.kts\":\"This file is a Gradle build script for an Android application. It sets up the project configuration, including the Android application plugin, Kotlin support, and dependencies. The file does not contain any classes or functions, but rather configures the build settings for the Android application.\",\"/app/src/androidTest/java/pro/grino/karateclup/ExampleInstrumentedTest.kt\":\"This file contains an instrumented test for an Android app. It does not define any classes or functions, but rather tests the context of the app under test.\\n\\nThe file does the following:\\n\\n1. Imports necessary Android testing libraries and classes.\\n2. Defines an instrumented test class `ExampleInstrumentedTest` that runs on an Android device.\\n3. Includes a single test method `useAppContext()` that checks if the package name of the app under test matches the expected value.\",\"/settings.gradle.kts\":\"This file is a Gradle configuration file for an Android project named \\\"KarateClup\\\". It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather configures the project\\u0027s build settings and dependencies. Here\\u0027s a summary of the different sections:\\n\\n`pluginManagement`: This section configures the repositories where Gradle plugins can be found, including Google\\u0027s repositories, Maven Central, and the Gradle Plugin Portal.\\n\\n`dependencyResolutionManagement`: This section configures the repositories where project dependencies can be found, including Google\\u0027s repositories and Maven Central. It also sets the `RepositoriesMode` to `FAIL_ON_PROJECT_REPOS`, which means that the build will fail if any project-specific repositories are defined.\\n\\n`rootProject.name`: This sets the name of the root project to \\\"KarateClup\\\".\\n\\n`include(\\\":app\\\")`: This includes the \\\":app\\\" module in the project.\"}"}
